column5: Preah Sihanouk provincial police commissioner Chuon Narin confirmed to the media that the final decision of the National Police Commission was not to hold a reenactment with the suspect who has confessed to killing two children in Prey Nub.------There were safety concerns after several hundred people arrived at the murder scene and fears the crowd could get angry and attack the suspect.------ 26-year-old Meng Vichet
column6: told the police he was drunk and on drugs when he killed the young boy and raped the 10 year old girl
